title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Haunted Vehicles and Supernatural Creatures Plague the Streets of Los Santos
content: The Halloween-inspired commotion in Los Santos is spreading. More mayhem is appearing around every corner, with haunted vehicles and supernatural creatures now roaming the streets. Confront chaos in Halloween Deathmatches, don more spooky masks, and boost your earnings in Freemode Events and Challenges.
